titles.title: MP191 God Of Glory, We Exalt Your Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God of glory, we exalt Your name,
You who reign in majesty,
We lift our hearts to You
And we will worship, praise and magnify
Your holy name.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
In power resplendent
You reign in glory,
Eternal King, You reign for ever.
Your word is mighty,
Releasing captives,
Your love is gracious,
You are my God.
